turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can I order a pizza from Monster's Pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You sure can! Would you like to order from the Jacksonville location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'll go with a medium pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm not sure, do they have any specialty pizzas or anything?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They do! They have a buffalo chicken pizza that everyone seems to enjoy. They also have the Monster pizza which is the biggest pizza in the area.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm, I'm not a huge fan of buffalo chicken, and it's just me so I don't think I'll need the monster.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, they also have every topping you can think of, from pepperoni to sardines.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I do a pepperoni and sausage?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, they have both of those toppings and they're both available.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does it cost more to add onions?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nope, those can be included at no extra cost.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So did you want the pepperoni, sausage, and onions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I think I'll go with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's all for tonight.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed and will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks so much!
